price: To, a lõkacin* da suka tafi da shi, kuma suka yi niyyar su sanya shi a cikin duhun rĩjiya, Muka yi wahayi zuwa gare shi, "Lalle ne, kanã bã su lãbari game da wannan al'amari nãsu, kuma sũ ba su sani ba."
arabic: فَلَمَّا ذَهَبُواْ بِهِۦ وَأَجۡمَعُوٓاْ أَن يَجۡعَلُوهُ فِي غَيَٰبَتِ ٱلۡجُبِّۚ وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ لَتُنَبِّئَنَّهُم بِأَمۡرِهِمۡ هَٰذَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
footnotes: * Suka cire rĩgarsa, suka jefa shi da gũga a cikin rĩjiya. Sa'an nan suka sanya wa rigarsa jinin wata dabba da suka yanka, dõmin ya zama alãmar cewa kerkeci ya cinye Yũsufu. Gã rĩgarsa ta ɓãci da jinin jikinsa, watau jinin shĩ ne alãmar yã mutu. Sai suka manta cewa kãfin kerkeci ya cinye yãro a cikin rĩgarsa, sai yã kekketa rĩgar tukun.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā dhahabū bihi wa-ajmaʿū an yajʿalūhu fī ghayābati al-jubi wa-awḥaynā ilayhi latunabbi-annahum bi-amrihim hādhā wahum lā yashʿurūna
